001
002import java.io.BufferedReader;
003import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
004import java.io.File;
005import java.io.FileReader;
006import java.net.URL;
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008import java.util.Collections;
009import java.util.List;
010
011/**
012 * web temperature setter
013 *
014 * @author matecsaba
015 */
016public class mailer {
017
018    /**
019     * this is needed for cli startup
020     *
021     * @param args command line parameters
022     */
023    public static void main(String[] args) {
024        mailer app = new mailer();
025        String a;
026        try {
027            ByteArrayOutputStream buf = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
028            a = "" + app.getClass();
029            a = mailer.httpRequest("http://localhost/" + a, "./" + a, "cli", "clibrowser", "user", args, buf);
030            a = "type=" + a + "\r\ndata:\r\n" + buf.toString();
031        } catch (Exception e) {
032            a = "exception " + e.getMessage();
033        }
034        System.out.println(a);
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * where i'm located in ram
039     */
040    protected static mailer staticMailer = null;
041
042    /**
043     * do one request
044     *
045     * @param url url of app
046     * @param path path of app
047     * @param peer client address
048     * @param agent user agent
049     * @param user auth data
050     * @param par parameters
051     * @param buf result buffer, if empty, pathname must present
052     * @return [pathname"][file name.]extension
053     * @throws Exception if something went wrong
054     */
055    public static String httpRequest(String url, String path, String peer,
056            String agent, String user, String[] par, ByteArrayOutputStream buf)
057            throws Exception {
058        if (staticMailer == null) {
059            staticMailer = new mailer();
060            staticMailer.path = path.substring(0, path.lastIndexOf("."));
061            staticMailer.url = new URL(url).getPath();
062            staticMailer.doInit();
063        }
064        staticMailer.doRequest(par, buf, user);
065        return "html";
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * where i'm located on host
070     */
071    protected String path;
072
073    /**
074     * where i'm located on net
075     */
076    protected String url;
077
078    /**
079     * where mail located on host
080     */
081    protected String mail = "";
082
083    /**
084     * initialize
085     */
086    public void doInit() {
087        readConfig();
088    }
089
090    private void readConfig() {
091        try {
092            BufferedReader f = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(path + ".cfg"));
093            mail = f.readLine();
094            f.close();
095        } catch (Exception e) {
096        }
097    }
098
099    /**
100     * do one request
101     *
102     * @param par parameters
103     * @param buf buffer to use
104     * @param user username
105     * @throws Exception if something went wrong
106     */
107    public void doRequest(String[] par, ByteArrayOutputStream buf, String user) throws Exception {
108        String id = "";
109        for (int i = 0; i < par.length; i++) {
110            String a = par[i];
111            int o = a.indexOf("=");
112            if (o < 1) {
113                continue;
114            }
115            String b = a.substring(0, o);
116            a = a.substring(o + 1, a.length());
117            if (b.equals("id")) {
118                id = a;
119            }
120        }
121        if (id.length() > 0) {
122            buf.write("<html><head><title>mailer</title></head><body>".getBytes());
123            try {
124                BufferedReader f = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(mail + user + "/" + id));
125                while (f.ready()) {
126                    buf.write(f.readLine().getBytes());
127                    buf.write("<br/>".getBytes());
128                }
129                f.close();
130            } catch (Exception e) {
131            }
132            buf.write("</body></html>".getBytes());
133            return;
134        }
135        File[] fls;
136        try {
137            fls = new File(mail + user + "/").listFiles();
138        } catch (Exception e) {
139            return;
140        }
141        List<File> fl = new ArrayList<File>();
142        for (int i = 0; i < fls.length; i++) {
143            fl.add(fls[i]);
144        }
145        Collections.sort(fl);
146        buf.write("<html><head><title>mailer</title></head><body><table border=1>".getBytes());
147        buf.write("<tr><td><b>from</b></td><td><b>subject</b></td><td><b>date</b></td></tr>".getBytes());
148        for (int fn = 0; fn < fl.size(); fn++) {
149            String a = fl.get(fn).getName();
150            if (!a.endsWith(".msg")) {
151                continue;
152            }
153            String u = url + "?id=" + a;
154            String from = "unknown";
155            String subj = "unspecified";
156            String date = "unknown";
157            try {
158                BufferedReader f = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(mail + user + "/" + a));
159                while (f.ready()) {
160                    a = f.readLine();
161                    if (a == null) {
162                        break;
163                    }
164                    if (a.length() < 1) {
165                        break;
166                    }
167                    int i = a.indexOf(":");
168                    if (i < 0) {
169                        continue;
170                    }
171                    String b = a.substring(i + 1, a.length()).trim();
172                    a = a.substring(0, i).trim().toLowerCase();
173                    if (a.equals("from")) {
174                        from = b;
175                        continue;
176                    }
177                    if (a.equals("subject")) {
178                        subj = b;
179                        continue;
180                    }
181                    if (a.equals("date")) {
182                        date = b;
183                        continue;
184                    }
185                }
186                f.close();
187            } catch (Exception e) {
188                continue;
189            }
190            a = "<tr><td><a href=" + u + ">" + from + "</a></td><td><a href=" + u + ">" + subj + "</a></td><td><a href=" + u + ">" + date + "</a></td></tr>";
191            buf.write(a.getBytes());
192        }
193        buf.write("</table></body></html>".getBytes());
194    }
195
196}
